details.description:
The ASICS Gel-Kayano 14 Black Pure Silver is a running shoe that pays homage to the style of the late 2000s with updated materials and construction.

This version of the ASICS Gel-Kayano 14 is made with a black mesh upper for breathability. Synthetic leather overlays can be seen across the midsole in black and silver forming the classic ASICS design. There are also black overlays around the toebox and heel for extra support. The ASICS logo appears in silver on the cushioned tongue, and GEL branding appears in silver on the heel. The shoe is equipped with a TRUSSTIC support system and trademark Gel cushioning for comfort and shock absorption.

What makes these shoes stand out is the black colorway. The black with a few accents of silver elevates these shoes from a simple running shoe to a stylish fashion choice. The ASICS Gel-Kayano 14 Black Pure Silver was released on January 1, 2024, for a price of $150.

The Asics Gel Kayano 14 White Midnight W is a sleek and stylish running shoe that offers both comfort and performance. The shoe features a white and midnight colorway that is both eye-catching and versatile. The upper is made of a breathable mesh material that allows for maximum airflow, while the Gel cushioning system in the sole provides excellent shock absorption and support. The Asics Gel Kayano 14 White Midnight W is set to release on February 5th, 2023, with a retail price of $150. This shoe is perfect for runners who want a comfortable and stylish shoe that can keep up with their active lifestyle. Something we love about the Asics Gel Kayano 14 White Midnight W is the combination of style and performance. Our experts think that the standout feature of this shoe is the Gel cushioning system, which provides excellent support and shock absorption. Overall, we love the Asics Gel Kayano 14 White Midnight W for its sleek design, comfortable fit, and excellent performance.

name: ASICS Gel Kayano 14 Arctic Sky Pure Silver

details.description: The ASICS Gel Kayano 14 Arctic Sky Pure Silver is a stunning addition to the renowned Gel Kayano line. This men's sneaker combines style and performance in a sleek package. The upper features a cool Arctic Sky colorway complemented by Pure Silver accents, creating a visually appealing design that's perfect for both athletic pursuits and casual wear. The shoe's construction incorporates ASICS' signature GEL technology in the midsole, providing superior cushioning and shock absorption for all-day comfort. Designed with both form and function in mind, the Gel Kayano 14 boasts a breathable mesh upper that ensures proper ventilation during intense workouts or long walks. The shoe's supportive structure and advanced cushioning system work together to provide excellent stability and reduce the risk of fatigue. With its blend of cutting-edge technology and stylish aesthetics, this ASICS model is an ideal choice for runners and sneaker enthusiasts alike. Our team thinks this product is great for those seeking a versatile sneaker that offers both performance benefits and fashionable appeal.

name: ASICS Gel-Kayano 14 Cream Black Metallic Plum

details.description:
The ASICS Gel-Kayano 14 Cream Black Metallic Plum is a running shoe that was released as part of the ASICS Gel-Kayano series.

The upper of the Cream Black Metallic Plum ASICS Gel-Kayano 14 is crafted with a combination of leather and mesh materials, offering both durability and breathability. The shoe comes in a cream-and-black colorway and has a traditional lace-up closure that ensures a snug and secure fit. The outsole features a vertical flex groove that enables the foot to move more naturally, reducing stress on the foot and the potential for injury.

We think that one of the most notable features of the ASICS Gel-Kayano 14 Cream Black Metallic Plum is the dynamic DuoMax support system on the sole. This system provides stability and support for the foot, reducing pronation and enhancing the overall efficiency of your stride. The Gel technology used in the heel of the shoe also provides additional cushioning to absorb impact and help prevent injuries and fatigue. The sneaker was released on May 30th, 2023, at a retail price of $150.

The ASICS Gel-Kayano 14 White Fjord Grey is a premium running shoe that combines style and performance. Featuring a sleek white upper with fjord grey accents, this sneaker offers a clean and versatile look suitable for both athletic pursuits and casual wear. The Gel-Kayano 14 incorporates ASICS' renowned GEL technology in the heel and forefoot, providing superior shock absorption and cushioning for a comfortable stride.

Built with durability and support in mind, the Gel-Kayano 14 boasts a robust construction that caters to various foot types. The engineered mesh upper ensures breathability, while the reinforced heel counter promotes stability during movement. With its blend of cutting-edge technology and timeless design, this shoe is ideal for runners seeking a reliable and stylish option for their daily training or long-distance runs. Our experts state this product is great for athletes looking for a perfect balance of comfort, performance, and aesthetic appeal in their running footwear.

The ASICS Gel-Kayano 14 Birch Pure Silver is a stunning addition to the iconic Gel-Kayano line, offering a perfect blend of style and performance. This men's sneaker features a sleek design with a birch and pure silver colorway, creating a versatile look that seamlessly transitions from the track to the streets. The upper is crafted with premium materials, ensuring durability and breathability for all-day comfort.

Engineered for optimal support and cushioning, the Gel-Kayano 14 incorporates ASICS' renowned GEL technology in the midsole. This innovative feature provides excellent shock absorption and enhances the overall comfort of the shoe. The responsive cushioning system adapts to your stride, making it an ideal choice for both casual wear and athletic activities. Us at StockX believe this product is great for runners and sneaker enthusiasts alike, offering a perfect balance of performance and style in one package.

The ASICS Gel-Kayano 14 Birch Dark Pewter is a reinterpretation of the Gel-Kayano 14, which finds inspiration in technical running shoes from the early 2000s.

Unlike its predecessors, the "Birch Dark Pewter" version features a sustainably dyed sock liner. This dyeing process requires 35 percent less water and reduces carbon emissions by up to 45 percent. The breathable mesh upper comes in Birch, while the synthetic leather overlays feature Dark Pewter with a metallic sheen. Like the original Gel-Kayano, this version includes responsive gel cushioning in the bulky midsole. The sneaker also features ASICS’ signature TRUSSTIC support system and a front lace closure. ASICS branding can be found on the tongue, the heel, and the insole.

Our StockX experts like the padding around the collar and on the tongue that contribute to the sneaker’s retro-inspired aesthetic. The ASICS Gel-Kayano 14 Birch Dark Pewter was released on January 1st, 2024, and retailed at $150.

name: ASICS Gel-Kayano 14 Oyster White Steeple Grey

details.description:
The ASICS Gel-Kayano 14 in Oyster White and Steeple Grey showcases a timeless colorway on a beloved classic as oyster white and steeple grey tones reimagine the original Gel-Kayano design.

Retaining the retro runner aesthetic of its 2008 predecessor, this modern update features an oyster white mesh upper layered with sleek steeple grey synthetic overlays that flow from the toe through the eyestay and wrap around the heel. The signature stripes pop in black and give the shoe structure and depth. The breathable oyster white mesh base dominates the toe box and side panels, delivering a lightweight and airy feel.  The midsole houses renowned GEL cushioning for all-day impact protection. Tying the look together, oyster white laces blend seamlessly with the upper.

Released on December 1, 2024, for $150, we love that the ASICS Gel-Kayano 14 Oyster White Steeple Grey has the addition of a TRUSSTIC support shank underfoot for enhanced stability between the heel and forefoot.

The ASICS Gel-Kayano 14 Metropolis Jasper Green draws elements from heritage models to create a technical sneaker with shiny metallic-silver accents and splashes of bright Jasper Green.

The mesh construction of the Metropolis Jasper Green ASICS Gel-Kayano 14 comes in Metropolis, a dark-gray hue that serves as a subtle backdrop for the leather overlays in metallic silver. Hits of Jasper Green cover the branding details on the mesh tongue and heel and add pops of color on the otherwise white midsole. Gel technology in the heel provides responsive cushioning, while the Trusstic system in the arch increases stability and reduces twisting motions. Finally, the sock liner was made using a dyeing method that reduces water consumption by up to 33 percent.

Our experts at StockX like that even though this version of the Gel-Kayano wasn’t designed by Toshikazu Kayano, it retains design elements drawn from the early 2000s. The ASICS Gel-Kayano 14 Metropolis Jasper Green was released on June 3, 2024, and sold for $150.

name: ASICS Gel-Kayano 14 Unlimited Pack White Fawn

details.description:
The ASICS Gel-Kayano 14 Unlimited Pack White Fawn is part of the Unlimited Pack and blends the classic Gel-Kayano 14’s performance capabilities with contemporary colors.

The lightweight, mesh upper of the Unlimited Pack White Fawn ASICS Gel-Kayano 14 comes in clean white and serves as a backdrop for the synthetic overlays in Fawn and metallic silver. Unlike other models in the Unlimited Pack, the "White Fawn" incorporates a traditional lacing system instead of a quick lace system. However, the sneaker still offers a full-length foam midsole with visible Gel technology in the forefoot and heel. The signature Trusstic support system prevents the shoe from twisting and provides stability in the midsole.

Our experts at StockX like the Gel technology’s slightly dark pink color. It makes the underfoot area stand out and matches part of the padded tongue. The ASICS Gel-Kayano 14 Unlimited Pack White Fawn was released on March 18, 2024, and sold for $150.

name: ASICS Gel-Kayano 14 Unlimited Pack Carrier Grey

details.description:
The ASICS Gel-Kayano 14 Unlimited Pack Carrier Grey blends age-old running DNA with winter-ready materials. Its charcoal mesh base sits on top of a sculpted midsole with exposed GEL pods and a supportive shank.

The unlimited pack carrier grey Gel-Kayano 14 by ASICS comes with a dual-layer charcoal mesh upper reinforced by metallic silver synthetic leather and suede for weather protection. A drawcord lace system replaces traditional eyelets for quick adjustments. There's an off-white EVA midsole with GEL cushions in front and heel, paired with a black rubber outsole and an exposed TRUSSTIC™ midfoot shank for added support. ASICS debuted in 1949 and continues to grow as a trusted sports brand.

Here at StockX, one of the things we like about the ASICS Gel-Kayano 14 Unlimited Pack Carrier Grey is its drawcord lacing, which simplifies on-the-fly tweaks without retying. We also like the exposed GEL unit for added cushioning and depth. It retailed at $150 when it was released on March 18, 2024.

The ASICS Gel Kayano 14 White Pure Gold combines a clean white design with accents of pure gold, offering both comfort and support for runners. Drawing inspiration from its 2008 predecessor, the sneaker reimagines the past by mirroring the original midsole tooling, seamlessly integrating modern GEL technology cushioning.

The Kayano 14 White Pure Gold features a predominantly white upper with elegant accents of pure gold, creating a striking visual contrast. Crafted with high-quality materials, it offers durability and breathability. This innovative running shoe incorporates ASICS' advanced Gel cushioning technology for superior comfort and shock absorption, enhancing the overall running experience. It has a visibly prominent Gel cushioning unit in the heel, providing responsive support and a distinctive look.

Our team appreciates the captivating combination of pristine white and luxurious pure gold accents and the integration of ASICS' renowned Gel cushioning technology that ensures exceptional comfort and impact absorption. The ASICS Gel Kayano 14 White Pure Gold was released on the 12th of January, 2021, and retailed at $150.
